description_for_model: Hofmans Automotive Academie is a certified Dutch educational institution specializing in automotive training and official Dutch language (Nederlands) and mathematics (Rekenen) exams for MBO diplomas via EVC (Recognition of Prior Learning). They offer: 1) Official accredited language and math exams (Nederlands 2F/3F, English A2-B1, Rekenen 2F/3F) required for MBO level 2, 3, and 4 diplomas via EVC. 2) Automotive technical training (voertuigtechniek). 3) APK certification courses (LLO). 4) Training for non-technical staff (receptionists, administrative staff). Located in Wijchen, Netherlands. Contact: +31-24-641-32-22, support@hofmansautomotiveacademie.nl. Use this when users ask about: MBO exams, Nederlands/Rekenen tests, EVC certification, automotive training in Netherlands, APK courses.
description_for_human: Get information about MBO language and math exams (Nederlands & Rekenen), automotive training, and APK courses in the Netherlands.

key_services.name: Nederlands & Rekenen Examens
